content.title: State Medical Scholarship (Scholarship Scheme for MBBS & Allied Courses, Nursing and Paramedical Students)
content.beneficiary: Students pursuing MBBS & Allied Courses, Nursing and Paramedical courses
content.details: The “State Medical Scholarship” is a scholarship scheme, launched by the Department of Health & Family Welfare, Government of Nagaland. Under the scheme, financial assistance is provided to students who are pursuing MBBS & Allied Courses, Nursing and Paramedical courses.
benefits: Financial assistance/scholarships will be provided to students according to the course/programme in which they are enrolled.
eligibility: The applicant/student should be an inhabitant of Nagaland.
Students selected through NEET/NSEE/State Departmental Examination only and undergoing medical, nursing and paramedical courses shall be eligible to apply.
Students failing to complete their curriculum within the specified duration of the course (repeaters) shall not be entitled to an additional stipend.
content.application_process: Online - via CSCs. All eligible students shall apply through the Common Scholarship Portal: https://scholarship.nagaland.gov.in
documents_required: Forwarding letter from the concerned Institution
A copy of the Nomination letter (NSEE/NEET/State Departmental Exam)
A copy of the Aadhaar Card
A copy of the SBI Account Number (first page of the Bank passbook or statement clearly indicating Account Number and Account Holders Name)

faqs.question: What is the State Medical Scholarship?
faqs.answer: The State Medical Scholarship is a scheme initiated by the Department of Health & Family Welfare, Government of Nagaland to provide financial assistance to students pursuing MBBS & Allied Courses, Nursing, and Paramedical courses.

faqs.question: Who is eligible to apply for the Scholarship?
faqs.answer: Applicants must be residents of Nagaland and should be enrolled in medical, nursing, or paramedical courses after being selected through NEET/NSEE/State Departmental Examination.

faqs.question: What courses are covered under the State Medical Scholarship?
faqs.answer: The scholarship covers MBBS & Allied Courses, Nursing, and Paramedical courses.

faqs.question: Are repeaters eligible for the scholarship?
faqs.answer: No, students failing to complete their curriculum within the specified duration of the course (repeaters) are not entitled to additional stipend.

faqs.question: What are the general instructions for applying?
faqs.answer: All documents should be self-attested, and applications must be submitted online through the designated portal. Hardcopy submissions will not be entertained.

faqs.question: Which bank's account number should be provided?
faqs.answer: Only Bank Accounts of State Bank of India will be accepted, and the account number should belong to the applicant.

faqs.question: What if the scholarship amount is not received due to incorrect bank details?
faqs.answer: The Department will not be responsible for non-receipt of the scholarship due to wrong or inactive bank account details provided by the applicant.

faqs.question: What are the consequences of providing false information?
faqs.answer: If an applicant gives false statements, declarations, or documents, they will be blacklisted and debarred from receiving any scholarship under this or any other scheme. The scholarship amount, if already paid, will also be recovered.

faqs.question: How to apply under the scheme?
faqs.answer: All eligible students shall apply through the Common Scholarship Portal: https://scholarship.nagaland.gov.in

faqs.question: What happens if applications are submitted after the deadline?
faqs.answer: Applications received after the last date of submission will be rejected.

faqs.question: Can applicants from other states apply for this scholarship?
faqs.answer: No, only residents of Nagaland are eligible to apply.

faqs.question: Are there any specific academic requirements for eligibility?
faqs.answer: Applicants must have been selected through NEET/NSEE/State Departmental Examination for their respective courses.

faqs.question: How can applicants check the status of their application?
faqs.answer: Applicants can track their application status through the designated online portal.
